title: Connection Failure

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Played one game today, had some server issues connection wise, then game closed will not login anymore....HELP

replies.body:
Issues connecting to the PvP.net service are usually caused by not having a stable connection to the service. This is often the result of local network settings that prevent a good link from being established. As a first step in resolving this, I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
